description.zh-cn: 南非裔加拿大及美国企业家、工程师、发明家和商业大亨。他是SpaceX的创始人、董事长、CEO和首席工程师；特斯拉的CEO、产品设计师；X公司的唯一持有者、创始人和董事长；xAI、无聊公司、Neuralink的创始人或联合创始人。他曾于2025年在美国总统唐纳·川普的政府中担任总统高级顾问并领导政府效率部。2022年，他成为世界首富。
description.en: South African-born Canadian and American entrepreneur, engineer, inventor, and business magnate. He is the founder, chairman, CEO, and chief engineer of SpaceX; CEO and product architect of Tesla, Inc.; sole owner, founder, and chairman of X Corp.; and founder or co-founder of xAI, The Boring Company, and Neuralink. In 2025, he served as a senior advisor to President Donald Trump, leading the Department of Government Efficiency. In 2022, he became the world's richest person.

description.zh-cn: 一家由埃隆·马斯克创立的美国私人航天制造商和太空运输服务公司，目标是实现月球和火星的探索。
description.en: An American private aerospace manufacturer and space transportation services company founded by Elon Musk with the goal of exploring the Moon and Mars.

description.zh-cn: 美国电动汽车和清洁能源公司，埃隆·马斯克是其早期投资者、CEO和产品设计师。
description.en: An American electric vehicle and clean energy company, where Elon Musk is an early investor, CEO, and product architect.

description.zh-cn: 一个社交网络服务平台，前身为Twitter。2022年被埃隆·马斯克收购，后改组为X。
description.en: A social network service platform, formerly known as Twitter. It was acquired by Elon Musk in 2022 and later rebranded as X.

description.zh-cn: 一个非营利的人工智能研究组织，旨在促进和发展友好的AI。埃隆·马斯克是其联合创始人之一。
description.en: A non-profit artificial intelligence research organization aimed at promoting and developing friendly AI. Elon Musk is one of its co-founders.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物、商人和媒体名人，第45任和第47任美国总统。他在2024年总统选举期间获得埃隆·马斯克的大力支持，并在胜选后任命马斯克领导新成立的政府效率部。
description.en: American politician, businessman, and media personality who served as the 45th and 47th President of the United States. He received strong support from Elon Musk during the 2024 presidential election and appointed Musk to lead the newly created Department of Government Efficiency after his victory.

description.zh-cn: 由美国总统唐纳·川普设立的部门，旨在减少官僚主义和浪费性支出。埃隆·马斯克被任命为该部门的领导者。
description.en: A department established by U.S. President Donald Trump to reduce bureaucracy and wasteful spending. Elon Musk was appointed to lead this department.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克的弟弟，与他共同创办了网络软件公司Zip2。
description.en: Elon Musk's younger brother, with whom he co-founded the web software company Zip2.

description.zh-cn: 由埃隆·马斯克和金巴尔·马斯克兄弟创办的网络软件公司，后被康柏公司收购。
description.en: A web software company founded by brothers Elon and Kimbal Musk, later acquired by Compaq.

description.zh-cn: 一家在线支付公司，由X.com和Confinity合并而成。2002年被eBay收购。
description.en: An online payments company formed from the merger of X.com and Confinity. It was acquired by eBay in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 由埃隆·马斯克联合创办的线上金融服务和电子邮件支付公司，后与Confinity合并成为PayPal。
description.en: An online financial services and email payment company co-founded by Elon Musk, which later merged with Confinity to become PayPal.

description.zh-cn: 一家由马克斯·列夫琴和彼得·提尔创办的线上银行，与X.com合并成为PayPal。
description.en: An online bank founded by Max Levchin and Peter Thiel, which merged with X.com to become PayPal.

description.zh-cn: Confinity的联合创始人，在X.com与Confinity合并后，取代埃隆·马斯克成为CEO。
description.en: Co-founder of Confinity who replaced Elon Musk as CEO after the merger with X.com.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国跨国电子商务公司，于2002年以15亿美元收购了PayPal。
description.en: An American multinational e-commerce corporation that acquired PayPal for $1.5 billion in 2002.

description.zh-cn: 一家美国信息技术公司，于1999年以3.07亿美元收购了Zip2。
description.en: An American information technology company that acquired Zip2 for $307 million in 1999.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国宾夕法尼亚州费城的一所私立研究型大学。埃隆·马斯克在此获得经济学和物理学学士学位。
description.en: A private research university in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. Elon Musk earned his bachelor's degrees in economics and physics here.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国加利福尼亚州的一所私立研究型大学。埃隆·马斯克曾被其材料科学博士课程录取，但两天后退学。
description.en: A private research university in California. Elon Musk was admitted to its materials science PhD program but dropped out after two days.

description.zh-cn: 位于加拿大安大略省金斯顿的一所公立研究型大学。埃隆·马斯克在转学至宾夕法尼亚大学前在此学习了两年。
description.en: A public research university in Kingston, Ontario, Canada. Elon Musk studied here for two years before transferring to the University of Pennsylvania.

nodes.id: 埃隆·马斯克收购推特案

zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克收购推特案
en: Acquisition of Twitter by Elon Musk

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克于2022年以440亿美元收购社交媒体平台Twitter的事件。
description.en: The event in which Elon Musk acquired the social media platform Twitter for $44 billion in 2022.

description.zh-cn: Twitter公司的前首席执行官，在埃隆·马斯克完成收购后被解雇。
description.en: Former CEO of Twitter, who was fired after Elon Musk's acquisition was completed.

description.zh-cn: 根据《1934年证券交易法》成立的美国政府独立机构，负责证券监督和管理。曾因涉嫌证券欺诈和未及时披露信息而起诉埃隆·马斯克。
description.en: An independent agency of the United States federal government, created by the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, responsible for securities regulation. It has sued Elon Musk for alleged securities fraud and failure to timely disclose information.

description.zh-cn: 东亚的一个岛屿。埃隆·马斯克曾建议将其设为中国的“特别行政区”以解决台海冲突。
description.en: An island in East Asia. Elon Musk suggested making it a 'special administrative region' of China to resolve cross-strait conflict.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家。其官员对埃隆·马斯克关于台湾的建议表示欢迎。
description.en: A country in East Asia. Its officials welcomed Elon Musk's suggestions regarding Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 2022年俄罗斯对乌克兰发动的全面入侵，是俄乌战争的重大升级。在此期间，埃隆·马斯克向乌克兰提供了星链服务。
description.en: A full-scale invasion of Ukraine by Russia in 2022, a major escalation of the Russo-Ukrainian War. During this period, Elon Musk provided Starlink services to Ukraine.

description.zh-cn: 东欧国家。在2022年俄罗斯入侵期间，接受了埃隆·马斯克提供的星链卫星上网设备。
description.en: A country in Eastern Europe. It received Starlink satellite internet devices from Elon Musk during the 2022 Russian invasion.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰总统。他对埃隆·马斯克在2022年俄罗斯入侵期间向乌克兰提供星链服务表示肯定。
description.en: President of Ukraine. He expressed appreciation for Elon Musk providing Starlink services to Ukraine during the 2022 Russian invasion.

description.zh-cn: 一项于2025年6月由美国众议院通过的国会支出法案。埃隆·马斯克对此法案的强烈反对导致他与特朗普政府的关系破裂。
description.en: A congressional spending bill passed by the U.S. House of Representatives in June 2025. Elon Musk's strong opposition to this bill led to the breakdown of his relationship with the Trump administration.

description.zh-cn: 由埃隆·马斯克于2025年7月5日宣布成立的新政党。
description.en: A new political party announced by Elon Musk on July 5, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大作家，埃隆·马斯克的第一任妻子。
description.en: Canadian author and the first wife of Elon Musk.

description.zh-cn: 英国女演员，曾与埃隆·马斯克两度结婚和离婚。
description.en: English actress who was married to and divorced from Elon Musk twice.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大音乐家、歌手、词曲作者和唱片制作人，曾是埃隆·马斯克的伴侣。
description.en: Canadian musician, singer, songwriter, and record producer, who was formerly the partner of Elon Musk.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大和南非模特、营养师，埃隆·马斯克的母亲。
description.en: Canadian-South African model and dietitian, and the mother of Elon Musk.

description.zh-cn: 南非机电工程师、飞行员和开发商，埃隆·马斯克的父亲。
description.en: South African electromechanical engineer, pilot, and property developer, and the father of Elon Musk.

description.zh-cn: Google的联合创始人。据报道，由于埃隆·马斯克涉嫌与其当时的妻子有染，他与马斯克的友谊破裂。
description.en: Co-founder of Google. His friendship with Elon Musk reportedly ruptured due to an alleged affair between Musk and Brin's then-wife.

description.zh-cn: 美国律师和企业家，谢尔盖·布林的前妻。有报道称她与埃隆·马斯克有婚外情，但马斯克对此予以否认。
description.en: American lawyer and entrepreneur, former wife of Sergey Brin. She was reportedly involved in an affair with Elon Musk, which Musk has denied.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克是梅伊·马斯克的儿子。
description.en: Elon Musk is the son of Maye Musk.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克是埃罗尔·马斯克的儿子。
description.en: Elon Musk is the son of Errol Musk.

description.zh-cn: 金巴尔·马斯克是埃隆·马斯克的弟弟。
description.en: Kimbal Musk is the younger brother of Elon Musk.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克与贾斯汀·马斯克于2000年至2008年间为夫妻关系，后离婚。
description.en: Elon Musk and Justine Musk were married from 2000 to 2008, and later divorced.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克与妲露拉·莱莉曾两度结婚并离婚，时间分别为2010-2012年和2013-2016年。
description.en: Elon Musk and Talulah Riley were married and divorced twice, from 2010-2012 and 2013-2016.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克与格莱姆斯在2018年至2021年间为伴侣关系。
description.en: Elon Musk and Grimes were partners between 2018 and 2021.

degree.zh-cn: 经济学文学士、物理学理学士
degree.en: Bachelor of Arts in Economics, Bachelor of Science in Physics

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克于1995年毕业于宾夕法尼亚大学，获得经济学和物理学双学士学位。
description.en: Elon Musk graduated from the University of Pennsylvania in 1995 with dual bachelor's degrees in economics and physics.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，马斯克被史丹佛大学的材料科学哲学博士课程录取，但于两天后退学。
description.en: In 1995, Musk was admitted to the PhD program in materials science at Stanford University but dropped out after two days.

description.zh-cn: 马斯克于1990年进入女王大学学习，并于两年后转学至宾夕法尼亚大学。
description.en: Musk entered Queen's University in 1990 and transferred to the University of Pennsylvania two years later.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，埃隆·马斯克与弟弟金巴尔共同创办了网络软件公司Zip2。
description.en: In 1995, Elon Musk co-founded the web software company Zip2 with his brother, Kimbal.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，金巴尔·马斯克与哥哥埃隆共同创办了网络软件公司Zip2。
description.en: In 1995, Kimbal Musk co-founded the web software company Zip2 with his brother, Elon.

description.zh-cn: 1999年2月，康柏公司以3.07亿美元收购了Zip2。
description.en: In February 1999, Compaq acquired Zip2 for $307 million.

description.zh-cn: 1999年，马斯克联合创办了线上金融服务和电子邮件支付公司X.com。
description.en: In 1999, Musk co-founded X.com, an online financial services and email payment company.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，X.com与线上银行Confinity合并，后公司改名为PayPal。
description.en: In 2000, X.com merged with the online bank Confinity, and the company was later renamed PayPal.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，Confinity与X.com合并，后公司改名为PayPal。
description.en: In 2000, Confinity merged with X.com, and the company was later renamed PayPal.

description.zh-cn: 由于对公司技术方向存在争议，董事会于2000年9月开除了时任CEO埃隆·马斯克，并任命彼得·提尔接替。
description.en: Due to disputes over the company's technical direction, the board fired then-CEO Elon Musk in September 2000 and appointed Peter Thiel as his replacement.

description.zh-cn: 2002年，EBay以15亿美元收购PayPal。
description.en: In 2002, eBay acquired PayPal for $1.5 billion.

description.zh-cn: 2002年6月，马斯克成立了太空探索技术公司SpaceX。
description.en: In June 2002, Musk founded the space exploration technology company SpaceX.

description.zh-cn: 2015年，埃隆·马斯克联合创办了人工智能研究组织OpenAI。
description.en: In 2015, Elon Musk co-founded the artificial intelligence research organization OpenAI.

relationships.target: 埃隆·马斯克收购推特案

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克于2022年4月13日提出以430亿美元收购Twitter，并于10月27日完成交易。
description.en: Elon Musk proposed to acquire Twitter for $43 billion on April 13, 2022, and completed the transaction on October 27.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年10月27日完成对Twitter的收购后，埃隆·马斯克立即解雇了时任CEO帕拉格·阿格拉瓦尔。
description.en: After completing the acquisition of Twitter on October 27, 2022, Elon Musk immediately fired then-CEO Parag Agrawal.

description.zh-cn: 美国证券交易委员会曾两次起诉马斯克。第一次在2018年，因其考虑将特斯拉私有化的推文涉嫌证券欺诈，导致马斯克辞去董事长职务并被罚款。第二次在2025年，因其在收购推特时未依法及时披露信息。
description.en: The SEC has sued Musk twice. The first time was in 2018 for alleged securities fraud related to his tweet about taking Tesla private, which resulted in Musk stepping down as chairman and paying a fine. The second time was in 2025 for failing to timely disclose information during his acquisition of Twitter.

description.zh-cn: 2024年11月12日，美国总统当选人唐纳·川普宣布将委任马斯克领导新设立的政府效率部。
description.en: On November 12, 2024, U.S. President-elect Donald Trump announced that he would appoint Musk to lead the newly established Department of Government Efficiency.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克被任命为总统高级顾问，领导政府效率部，任期从2025年1月20日至同年5月30日。
description.en: Elon Musk was appointed Senior Advisor to the President to lead the Department of Government Efficiency, serving from January 20, 2025, to May 30 of the same year.

description.zh-cn: 在2024年美国总统选举期间，马斯克大力支持并资助特朗普的竞选活动，并在其胜选后加入政府任职，直至2025年6月因《大而美法案》分歧而关系破裂。
description.en: During the 2024 U.S. presidential election, Musk strongly supported and funded Trump's campaign, joining his administration after the victory, until their relationship broke down in June 2025 over disagreements on the 'Big and Beautiful Bill'.

description.zh-cn: 2025年6月，因对《大而美法案》的严重分歧，马斯克与特朗普的关系急剧恶化，双方公开互相批评和威胁。
description.en: In June 2025, due to severe disagreements over the 'Big and Beautiful Bill', Musk's relationship with Trump deteriorated sharply, with both sides publicly criticizing and threatening each other.

description.zh-cn: 埃隆·马斯克因强烈反对《大而美法案》而与特朗普政府决裂，并最终离开政府。
description.en: Elon Musk's strong opposition to the 'Big and Beautiful Bill' led to his break with the Trump administration and his eventual departure from the government.

description.zh-cn: 在与特朗普决裂后，埃隆·马斯克于2025年7月5日宣布成立“美国党”。
description.en: After his break with Trump, Elon Musk announced the formation of the 'American Party' on July 5, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年俄罗斯入侵乌克兰期间，马斯克向乌克兰提供星链卫星上网设备，以满足当地的通讯需求。
description.en: During the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine, Musk provided Ukraine with Starlink satellite internet devices to meet local communication needs.

description.zh-cn: 乌克兰总统泽连斯基对马斯克在俄罗斯入侵期间向乌克兰提供星链服务的行为表示了肯定和感谢。
description.en: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy expressed his approval and gratitude for Musk's action of providing Starlink services to Ukraine during the Russian invasion.

description.zh-cn: 2022年10月，马斯克建议将台湾设为“中国的特别行政区”，该言论引发了广泛争议。
description.en: In October 2022, Musk suggested making Taiwan a 'special administrative region of China,' a statement that caused widespread controversy.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交部和驻美大使对马斯克关于将台湾设为特别行政区的建议表示欢迎和支持。
description.en: The Chinese Foreign Ministry and the ambassador to the US welcomed and supported Musk's suggestion of making Taiwan a special administrative region.

description.zh-cn: 据《华尔街日报》报道，因马斯克涉嫌与布林的妻子妮可·沙纳汉有染，导致两人友谊破裂。马斯克否认了该指控。
description.en: According to The Wall Street Journal, their friendship ruptured after Musk allegedly had an affair with Brin's wife, Nicole Shanahan. Musk denied the allegation.
